claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Susan `` Sue '' Sylvester is a fictional character of the Fox musical comedy-drama series , Glee .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The character is portrayed by actress Jane Lynch , and has appeared in Glee from its pilot episode , first broadcast on May 19 , 2009 .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Sue was developed by Glee creators Ryan Murphy , Brad Falchuk , and Ian Brennan .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: For the show 's first four seasons , Sue is the track-suit wearing coach of the William McKinley High School cheerleading squad , and a ruthless bully to both students and faculty members alike .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Because her cheerleading squad competes with the glee club for the school 's limited funding , she is often at odds with the club and more particularly its director Will Schuester  (  Matthew Morrison  )  .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Sue is the main antagonist throughout the series ' run .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In the show 's fifth season , Sue is made the school 's new principal .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Due to Lynch 's initial limited availability , Sue was originally set to be a recurring character while Lynch was working on a Damon Wayans pilot for the American Broadcasting Company  (  ABC  )  .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: When that pilot fell through , Sue became a starring role .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The character has been acclaimed by critics .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Mary McNamara for the Los Angeles Times has written that `` Lynch alone makes Glee worth watching '' , while Entertainment Weekly Ken Tucker has called Sue `` the greatest Broadway-musical villain to ever co-star in a TV series '' .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In recognition of her portrayal of Sue , Lynch won an Emmy and a Golden Globe Award .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As of the season premiere , fourteen main cast members retained that status from the third season : glee club director Will Schuester  (  Matthew Morrison  )  , cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester  (  Jane Lynch  )  , glee club members Artie Abrams  (  Kevin McHale  )  , Blaine Anderson  (  Darren Criss  )  , Tina Cohen-Chang  (  Jenna Ushkowitz  )  , and Brittany Pierce  (  Heather Morris  )  , and graduates Rachel Berry  (  Lea Michele  )  , Mike Chang  (  Harry Shum , Jr.  )  , Finn Hudson  (  Cory Monteith  )  , Kurt Hummel  (  Chris Colfer  )  , Mercedes Jones  (  Amber Riley  )  , Santana Lopez  (  Naya Rivera  )  and Noah `` Puck '' Puckerman  (  Mark Salling  )  .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In `` Hell-O '' , cheer-leading coach Sue Sylvester  (  Jane Lynch  )  attempts to sabotage the relationship between glee club members Finn Hudson  (  Cory Monteith  )  and Rachel Berry  (  Lea Michele  )  .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: She is best known as Sue Sylvester on Glee .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The season was nominated for four Primetime Emmy Awards including one for Lynch 's performance as Sue Sylvester and the Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Comedy Series .

claim: Sue Sylvester is portrayed exclusively by a male actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The episode takes place as a tragedy to Dalton Academy causes rival groups New Directions and the Warblers to unite , and the lies surrounding Sue Sylvester come to a climactic head that results in her being fired and exposed on television , and yet she somehow recovers .
